alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Maury; Rutherford; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 4:56PM CDT until August 26 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Marshall County in Middle Tennessee... Western Rutherford County in Middle Tennessee... Maury County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Williamson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 455 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Columbia to Eagleville, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lewisburg, Spring Hill, Mount Pleasant, Chapel Hill, Eagleville, Santa Fe, Culleoka, I-65 East Of Columbia, and Farmington. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 35 and 55. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
